text: Booker T. Jones (born November 12, 1944) is an American musician, songwriter, record producer and arranger. He is famous as the leader of the band Booker T. & the M.G.'s. He has also worked in recording studios with some of the highest regarded musicians of the 20th and 21st centuries, and in 2007 was given a Grammy Award for a lifetime of good work. ==Albums== * Green Onions (1962) * I Want You (1981) * Potato Hole (2009) ==References== ==Other websites== * Official homepage *Booker T. interview May 2009 *Article *AV Club: article *wtop.com: article Category:African-American musicians Category:American R&B; musicians Category:American songwriters Category:American soul musicians Category:Musicians from Memphis, Tennessee Category:1944 births Category:Living people
title: Booker T. Jones
